channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Job-hugging’ in this economy? What it is, and how it could cost you.
OPEC+ meets this weekend at a precarious time for crude oil. What's at stake.
Why Bessent's essay against the Fed is a bid for 'control' over the central bank
How to watch Friday’s streaming-exclusive NFL game live online for free—and without cable
item.description: This season's Taylor Swift-watch gets underway.

item.title: Hundreds detained at Georgia’s top economic development project as immigration crackdown collides with U.S. manufacturing push
item.description: Immigration authorities detained 475 people, most of them South Koreans, during a raid on Hyundai's EV manufacturing site in Georgia.

item.title: Is the Fed ready to go big? Analysts debate jumbo rate cut after soft jobs data
item.description: A half-point cut is “now in play,” some analysts say.

item.title: Anthropic reaches $1.5 Billion settlement with authors in landmark copyright case
item.description: Anthropic’s deal with authors may accelerate a shift toward licensing copyrighted material needed to train AI models, legal experts say

item.title: Palantir CEO Alex Karp says U.S. labor workers won’t lose their jobs to AI—‘it’s not true’
item.description: The company has launched a new storytelling project Karp hopes will change the narrative around AI, and the CEO says it is one of his “biggest priorit...

item.title: Why AMD’s stock just saw one of the worst drops in the S&P 500 on Friday
Kenvue fights back against RFK Jr.’s Tylenol safety concerns as its stock sinks
